flavor: "Everything is simpler than it seems. The connection is there if you look for it."
name: Kate Winthrop
text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on [action] abilities on Researched cards or cards with a Researched upgrade.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. If you succeed, place 1 charge on Flux Stabilizer.
back_flavor: A quiet and resourceful girl, Kate worked as a research scientist at Miskatonic University. She and a fellow scientist, Professor Young, were pioneers in the field of dimensional science. However, a lab accident opened a portal to another dimension and a creature emerged. That creature then proceeded to tear Professor Young to pieces. Kate lived, but the memories of that day still haunt her which is why she's determined to keep that from ever happening again.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, cards with "investigate" in its text level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, [[Science]] cards level O-3. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Flux Stabilizer, Dimensional Study, Dimensional Rift, 1 random basic weakness.

name: Flux Stabilizer
text:
Permanent. Kate Winthrop deck only. Uses (2 charges).
[reaction] After you succeed an [intellect] skill test by 2 or more, place 1 charge on Flux Stabilizer.
[reaction] When you resign or the game ends: For every 4 charges on Flux Stabilizer, reduce the experience cost of the first Researched card you upgrade before the next scenario by 1.
[free] Spend 2 charges: Shuffle Dimensional Study from your discard pile back into your deck.

name: Dimensional Study
text:
Kate Winthrop deck only.
[reaction] When you search your deck and Dimensional Study is among the searched cards, draw it. (Max one [[Research]] ability per search.)
Choose a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and test [intellect](X), where X is that enemy's fight value. If you succeed, defeat that enemy, or evade that enemy and move it to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Dimensional Rift
text: Revelation - Put Dimensional Rift into play in your threat area. [fast] Spend 1 charge from Flux Stabilizer: Search your bonded cards, discard pile, and deck for Rift Walker and draw it. Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: Search your bonded cards, discard pile, and deck for Rift Walker and draw it. Forced - If Dimensional Rift has 2 or more damage on it: Discard it.

flavor: A dimensional hunter responsible for shredding Kate's mentor, Professor Young. The last time Kate encountered this creature, it scented her and seems to know exactly where to find her...
name: Rift Walker
text: Bonded (Dimensional Rift, Flux Stabilizer). Forced - At the end of the round: Set Rift Walker aside, out of play. Move all damage tokens from Rift Walker onto Dimensional Rift.

name: Grand Unified Theory
text:
Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories").
Uses (3 secrets).
[fast] During a skill test, spend 1 secret and exhaust Grand Unified Theory: You get +1 skill value for each "Memories" you have.

name: Science Over Mysticism
text:
Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories").
[action] Discard a [[Spell]] or [[Ritual]] under your control or from your hand: Draw 1 card and gain X resources, where X is the resource cost of the discarded card.

name: Germanium Detector
text: Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories"). [action] Exhaust Germanium Detector: Choose any revealed location. That location gets -2 shroud and investigators may perform Scan abilities as if they were at that location until the end of the round.

name: Sub-Electron Noise Sensor
text: Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories"). [action] Choose any revealed location with exactly 1 clue remaining. You may either (choose one): - Investigate. Investigate with +2 [intellect] as if you were at that location. - Activate a Scan ability at that location.

name: Machine Learning Algorithm
text:
Researched (2 experience and 1 "Memories").
[reaction] After an investigator at your location performs a skill test, exhaust Machine Learning Algorithm: That investigator get +1 to all skill tests of the same type until the end of the round.

name: Nuclear Power Bank
text: Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories"). Resources on Nuclear Power Bank may be spent to pay for events played by any investigator at your location. Forced - When the round ends: Add 2 resource tokens on this card. If it has 5 or more resources, discard it and deal 2 damage to each enemy and investigator at your location.

name: International Collaboration
text:
Researched (2 experience and 1 "Memories").
[reaction] When you would gain resources or draw cards from a player card effect, exhaust International Collaboration: Choose any investigator. That investigator may gain that many resources or draw that many cards instead.

name: Rational Mind
text:
Researched (3 experience and 1 "Memories").
[reaction] When you play a [[Science]] card: Place 1 resource (from the token pool) on this card, as evidence.
 While Rational Mind has...
- ... 1 or more evidence, you get +1 [willpower].
-  .. 2 or more evidence, you get +1 [intellect].
- ... 3 or more evidence, you get + 1 sanity.

name: Particle Accelerator
text:
Researched (5 experience and 1 "Memories").
[reaction] After you reveal a [tablet], [elder_thing], or [auto_fail] during a skill test, spend 1 resource and exhaust Particle Accelerator: Gain 1 clue from the token bank.

name: Special Relativity
text: Researched (5 experience and 1 "Memories"). [action] Take 1 direct horror: Peek at the other side of any location. If it is... - ...a revealed location, flip that location. - ...anything else, Move. Move to that location.
